title: Please help me fps drop
body:
So when i play leage and start a game i have around 60-100 fps and then in the middle of the game it drops to 0-10 fps and stays there for the rets of the game untill i quit leage and start it again and play a game it goes again in the middle of the game to 0-10 fps 

Would be happy if someone helped me Thank u.{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Framerate (FPS) issues can be caused by a handful of potential culprits, including display drivers, poor windows power settings, or hardware failure. I strongly recommend working through our [**FPS Troubleshooting guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), as it covers the most common solutions for this.

Hit me up if you experience further issues after working through the guide.
By the way I am playing on a laptop but before it was fine when i played.
